docs.snippet: Catcher Russell Martin, who helped the Pirates to consecutive wild-card berths, built on that success by agreeing with the Blue Jays on a five-year, $82 million contract....
docs.lead_paragraph: Catcher Russell Martin, who helped the Pirates to consecutive wild-card berths, built on that success by agreeing with the Blue Jays on a five-year, $82 million contract.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes Russell Martin, former New York Yankees catcher, agrees with the Toronto Blue Jays on a five-year, $82 million contract, pending a physical exam; if Martin helps Blue Jays to the playoffs, he could be hailed as a hero in Canada, his native country.

headline.seo: Russell Martin Heads to the Toronto Blue Jays
headline.main: Blue Jays Stake Future on Former Yankee
headline.print_headline: Blue Jays Stake Future on Former Yankee

docs.snippet: Farhan Zaidi spent 10 years in Oakland, where he earned the admiration of General Manager Billy Beane. With the Dodgers, who hired Zaidi this month as general manager, he will have vast resources to exploit....
docs.lead_paragraph: Farhan Zaidi spent 10 years in Oakland, where he earned the admiration of General Manager Billy Beane. With the Dodgers, who hired Zaidi this month as general manager, he will have vast resources to exploit.
docs.abstract: Profile of Farhan Zaidi, Los Angeles Dodgers' new general manager, who fell in love with baseball and learned how to play it while growing up in the Philippines.

headline.seo: For Dodgers G.M. Farhan Zaidi, New Team Affords New Possibilities
headline.main: Inheriting a Payroll of Rich Possibilities
headline.print_headline: A Love of the Game, Honed Across the Globe

docs.snippet: Giancarlo Stanton agreed to terms with Miami on a 13-year contract that is the most lucrative deal for an American athlete....
docs.lead_paragraph: Giancarlo Stanton agreed to terms with Miami on a 13-year contract that is the most lucrative deal for an American athlete.
docs.abstract: Baseball Roundup; Miami Marlins agree to 13-year, $325 million contract with star outfielder Giancarlo Stanton; deal includes no-trade clause and Stanton can opt out after six years; other news noted.

headline.main: Marlins’ Deal With Stanton Sets a Record
headline.print_headline: Marlins’ Deal With Stanton Sets a Record

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and TYLER KEPNER

docs.snippet: Ken Takakura, an actor known as "Japan's Clint Eastwood" for his portrayal of tough but principled gangsters in over 100 movies and who gained international fame in director Ridley Scott's "Black Rain," has died at the age of 83....

docs.snippet: Bidding for the Olympics will become cheaper, easier and more attractive while sports will enter the Games quicker, the IOC said on Tuesday, presenting the biggest changes in decades in the way the Games are organised and run....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bidding for the Olympics will become cheaper, easier and more attractive while sports will enter the Games quicker, the IOC said on Tuesday, presenting the biggest changes in decades in the way the Games are organised and run.

headline.main: IOC to Bring in Cheaper, Easier Bidding for Games
headline.print_headline: IOC to Bring in Cheaper, Easier Bidding for Games

docs.snippet: Breaking from the tradition of awarding the Olympics only to a single host city, the IOC is opening the door to possible wider bids — including bids from an entire country, joint bids from more than one city and even the possibility of event...
docs.lead_paragraph: Breaking from the tradition of awarding the Olympics only to a single host city, the IOC is opening the door to possible wider bids — including bids from an entire country, joint bids from more than one city and even the possibility of events held in more than one country.

headline.main: IOC Opens Door to Joint Bids and New Sports Events
headline.print_headline: IOC Opens Door to Joint Bids and New Sports Events
